name: Power Panic (bitDecay Games, nandemoguy, Shadoninja)
description:
Inspired by the handhelds of the 80's and early 90's, Power Panic follows a city electrician trying to keep the power flowing through the city.

This game was our submission for Global Game Jam 2018 with the theme "Transmission"

Created in 48 hours using:

Godot

 FL Studio

Known issues:

  • Loading can take some time
  • Moving right as you take damage can result in strange character rendering
